about_the_game:
Objecive


You are given 3 lives with your memory lost at the beginning of the game.
The goal of the game is to recover your memory without exhausting your life.

Once you enter the stage, you must collect memories and escape.
If you don't escape the stage, you'll lose your life one by one.
When the remaining lives reach zero, you lose and the game ends.

How to play the game


Character Control

Players control their characters with a mouse.

When moving the mouse, the character moves to the mouse position.
If you want to make the camera follow the character, you can press the Y key to turn on the auto-move function of the camera.

When left-click, attack in the direction the character is looking at.
Attacking objects such as wood or rocks can acquire resources such as wood or ore.
You can attack monsters and cause damage.

If you attack trees or rocks, you can get a certain amount of wood or ore. ***

Wood is used to make simple altars.
Ore is used to strengthen a character's ability and weapon, or to create new weapons.

Defeating monsters will allow you to acquire accessories items.
The acquired accessory items have different special effects.

Day and Night

Day and night change over time.
At night, the character's mentality decreases.
At this time, you can maintain your mentality by installing a simple altar using wood.
If you have enough wood, you can press the T key to set up a simple altar.
The amount of wood acquired is indicated by the number next to the wood icon at the top left of the screen.

Crafting and Enhancement

Collecting a certain amount of ore can enhance character abilities and weapons, or create new weapons.
At that time, several options are displayed on the screen.

Memory Collection

The stage has objects that can absorb memory.
You can directly absorb memory by pressing the space key on relics and ruins.
Also, you can get a small amount of memories if you kill monsters, and a large amount of memories if you kill boss monsters.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10

short_description: Be the main character who lost his memory, go into the memory of the past, collect your memories, get rid of monsters, and go back to the original world.
